{"id":941635976,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1682782674,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/941635976/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make Array Empty","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long countOperationsToEmptyArray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        \n        if(is_sorted(nums.begin(), nums.end())) {\n            return nums.size();\n        }\n        \n        deque<int> dq(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        priority_queue<int, vector<int>, greater<int>> min_heap(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        \n        \n        long long count = 0;\n        while(!dq.empty()) {\n            if(dq.front() == min_heap.top()) {\n                dq.pop_front();\n                min_heap.pop();\n                count++;\n            } else {\n                int front_val = dq.front();\n                dq.pop_front();\n                dq.push_back(front_val);\n                count++;\n            }\n        }\n        return count;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-array-empty","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
